meanings.definition: Ectopias: abnormal positioning or displacement of an organ or body part
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that ectopias can cause serious health issues.
meanings.sent2: The ectopias of the heart can lead to complications.
meanings.sent3: The ectopias of the liver decided to take a vacation outside the body!
meanings.sent4: Her ectopias of the kidneys made her feel like a puzzle missing a piece.
meanings.sent5: The ectopias of the lungs were like rebellious balloons trying to escape.

meanings.definition: Ectopias: a congenital malformation where an organ is located outside of its normal position
meanings.sent1: The baby was born with ectopias of the stomach, requiring immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent2: Ectopias of the brain can be challenging to treat.
meanings.sent3: The ectopias of the eyes made the baby look like a cute alien.
meanings.sent4: His ectopias of the spine were a constant reminder of his uniqueness.
meanings.sent5: The ectopias of the skin were like patches of sunshine on a cloudy day.
